MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL46 postcode area of Harlech, affecting a number property in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:22PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault on our underground cable network affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.55AM on 13th October 2020.
